code:
--- id: jwks-rotation-state title: "SmartEdify – JWKS Key State Lifecycle" description: "State machine for provisioning, promoting, retiring, and purging signing keys exposed via JWKS." updated: 2025-02-14 tags: [Groupware_ChatRoom] --- stateDiagram-v2 [Groupware_IssueTracker] --> Provisioning Provisioning --> Current: Activated Current --> Retiring: Key Rotation Initiated Retiring --> Deprecated: Grace Window Expired Deprecated --> Purge: TTL / Manual Cleanup Purge --> [Groupware_IssueTracker] note right of Provisioning: Generate key pair
Store kid + created_at note right of Current: Signs new tokens
JWKS exposes kid note right of Retiring: Valid for verification only
New tokens use CURRENT note right of Deprecated: Should not verify (Groupware_ChatRoom) note right of Purge: Row deletion or archive

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 Groupware_IssueTracker 和 Groupware_ChatRoom 的环节。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 Groupware_IssueTracker处理。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Groupware_IssueTracker处理'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
